XFuFastRandom.h

00001 /*! \file 
00002  * X-Forge Util <br>
00003  * Copyright 2000-2003 Fathammer Ltd
00004  * 
00005  * \brief Implementation of a "fast" random class. 
00006  * 
00007  * $Id: XFuFastRandom.h,v 1.9 2003/10/03 11:29:31 jetro Exp $
00008  * $Date: 2003/10/03 11:29:31 $
00009  * $Revision: 1.9 $
00010  */
00011 
00012 #ifndef XFUFASTRANDOM_H_INCLUDED
00013 #define XFUFASTRANDOM_H_INCLUDED
00014 
00015 
00016 //! A "fast" pseudo random number generator class.
00017 /*!
00018  * Please note that the output from this pseudorandom number generator
00019  * is pretty poor, but it is suitable when all you need is just some noise.
00020  */
00021 class XFuFastRandom
00022 {
00023 public:
00024     
00025     //! Constructor.
00026     XFuFastRandom();
00027     
00028     //! Constructor with seed input.
00029     XFuFastRandom(UINT32 aSeed);
00030     
00031     //! Returns the next random number.
00032     inline UINT32 next()
00033     {
00034         INT32 v = (INT32)mSeed1;
00035         mSeed1 = ((v >> 13) + (v << (32 - 13)));  
00036         v = mSeed2 ^ 0x51549515;
00037         mSeed2 = mSeed1 ^ mSeed2;
00038         mSeed1 = v;
00039         return mSeed1;
00040     }
00041     
00042     //! Re-seeds the random number generator.
00043     void seed(UINT32 aSeed);
00044     
00045 protected:
00046 
00047     UINT32 mSeed1;      //!< Internal random number generator data.
00048     UINT32 mSeed2;      //!< Internal random number generator data.
00049 };
00050 
00051 
00052 #endif // !XFUFASTRANDOM_H_INCLUDED
00053
